original_text: Around the throne were twenty-four thrones, and seated on the thrones were twenty-four elders, clothed in white garments, with golden crowns on their heads.
korean_text: 또 보좌에 둘려 이십사 보좌들이 있고 그 보좌들 위에 이십사 장로들이 흰 옷을 입고 머리에 금관을 쓰고 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: Around the throne were twenty-four thrones
sentences.korean_translation: 보좌 주위에는 스물네 개의 보좌가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and seated on the thrones were twenty-four elders
sentences.korean_translation: 그 보좌들에는 스물네 장로가 앉아 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: with golden crowns on their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 머리에는 금 면류관을 쓰고 있었습니다
